verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Here we are
Gathered together as a family
Bound as one
Lifting up our voices
To the King of kings
We cry

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Abba, Father, worthy is Your name
Abba, Father, worthy is Your name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Here we are
Singing together as a family
Bound as one
Lifting up our voices
To the King of kings
We sing

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Abba, Father, holy is Your name
Abba, Father, holy is Your name
